about_the_game:
Run and upgrade your little Bunny Tavern! 

Many years ago there existed a little tavern run entirely by bunnies. It was a quiet, safe place for other bunnies to come for an evening meal. 

Bunny Tavern takes its inspiration from the diner games of our youth but with a more relaxed twist. Grow your own food, cook it up in cauldrons, serve it to your happy customers, and upgrade your tavern with all your newfound coin. 

Gameplay

Grow your own food to save money on ingredients

Upgrade furniture to earn more money

Hire workers to reduce your workload

Buy fancy new kitchen gadgets to make cooking a breeze

Collect art to hang on the walls

Unlock paint colors to decorate your tables, walls, and chairs

New recipes will draw in better customers

And be on the lookout for rare colored bunnies to fill your collection book!

Art

Art is done by the talented Marta.IntoTheForest on Instagram!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Big Sur 11 or newer
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, x64 architecture with SSE2
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 version 21H1 or newer
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support, ARM64
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 or Vulkan capable GPUs
